entries.message: An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.
This maintenance window has been completed.

Our engineering team will be performing upgrades to infrastructure in our Dallas location. During this maintenance window, the following functions will not be available:

• VPS instance consoles from the Vultr dashboard
• Bare Metal deployment and power control

Previously deployed servers in Dallas will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.
